channel.title: The Daily Micah
channel.description: Daily briefing on AI, product leadership, and Orlando news
channel.itunes:author: Ben

item.title: The Daily Micah — 2026-02-27
item.description: Dive into the dawn of the “agentic era” as AI moves from answering questions to executing complex tasks, sparking high-stakes ethical standoffs between tech giants and the military. This episode also explores the real-world friction of driverless cars in residential neighborhoods, the latest shifts in the housing market, and surprising developments in national security and global diplomacy.
